title: Out of Nothing, Everything: Conversations with Larry Harvey
author: Burning Man Project
content:
Burning Man Project’s Philosophical Center has released an e-book titled Out of Nothing, Everything: Conversations with Larry Harvey, and we are offering it to the community as a free download. It’s based on a series of interviews conducted between 2013 and 2015 by journalist and monologist Jeff Greenwald, the best-selling author of works including Shopping for Buddhas and The Size of the World.

Out of Nothing, Everything is a wide-ranging series of interviews that showcases the thoughtfulness, humor, and humanity of Burning Man’s late founder and original instigator in the format he loved best: intimate conversation with a trusted friend.

Here’s the eBook. You can also download the eReader version here.
